Package org.appkit.templating

JSON Templating for UI components

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ControlCreator<E extends Control> Implement this to enable Controls that don't have a (EventContext, Composite, Options) constructor to be used with Templating
LayoutUI Implement this to enable a Control to have children.
 

Class Summary
Component This is the handle on the Component you get after calling Templating.create(String, Composite).
Templating Templating enables loading Interface-Descriptions out of JSON.
 

Package org.appkit.templating Description

JSON Templating for UI components
